tilt.image.matchup

Class Matrix

  • java.lang.Object
    • tilt.image.matchup.Matrix

  • public class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
    An MxN (x by y) matrix of ints through which to find the best alignment (adapted from Needleman & Wunsch J. Mol. Biol. 48 (1970) 443-453). This is used for joining up partial lines as they are identified in a page.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Matrix(int[] list1, int[] list2)
      Compute the best alignment of two arrays of ints via dynamic programming
